Question: This person's first classical recording dates from April 25, 1938 when he recorded Mozart's Clarinet Quintet in A major, K.
Hints: This person's only starring feature was Sweet and Low-Down (1944).
This person learned quickly, becoming a strong player at an early age: he was soon playing professionally in various bands.
He would disband his own group in 1939 and become a full-time arranger for this person.
